nag.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to keep asking someone to do something, or to keep complaining to someone about their behaviour, in an annoying way
nag.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Nadia’s been nagging me to fix the lamp.
She keeps nagging me about my weight.
He’s always nagging at Paula for wearing too much makeup.
nag.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to make someone feel continuously worried or uncomfortable
nag.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: a problem that had been nagging at him for days
nag.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a person who keeps complaining or asking someone to do something, in an annoying way
nag.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: a horse, especially one that is old or in bad condition
